title: Absence of Color
description: Librarian's Note: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found Here and Here When nobody is who he or she seems to be, how do you know whom to trust? Join the adventures of Darby and Wagner, partners who work for an underground spy network, call 'The Black Rose' and is led by a woman named Lil Red. But who are all these players, really? A new twist on a coming of age story that will have you wondering who is who and what will happen next.
author: S.K. Wee
